news.title: Epstein-linked longevity guru Peter Attia leaves David Protein, and his own startup ‘won’t comment’
news.summary: Attia co-founded longevity medical testing startup Biograph, which came out of stealth a year ago.

news.title: India’s Varaha bags $20M to scale carbon removal from the Global South
news.summary: Varaha's fresh funding is part of a $45 million Series B round led by WestBridge Capital.

news.title: The Minneapolis tech community holds strong during ‘tense and difficult time’
news.summary: Founders and investors in the Minneapolis tech industry told TechCrunch they've put much of their work on hold to help out their community.

news.title: Intel will start making GPUs, a market dominated by Nvidia
news.summary: Intel has been bulking up a team to focus on this effort and will develop its GPU strategy around customer needs.

news.title: YC startups can now receive investment in stablecoin
news.summary: All startups accepted into YC will soon have the option to receive their seed checks via stablecoins.

news.title: Adobe actually won’t discontinue Animate
news.summary: Adobe is no longer planning to discontinue Adobe Animate on March 1st. news.title: Republicans haul Netflix before Congress for being too ‘woke’
news.summary: Netflix CEO Ted Sarandos was launched into the middle of a congressional culture war on Tuesday as he testified before a Senate subcommittee about the company's attempt to buy a large part of Warner Bros Discovery. news.title: AMD hints Microsoft could launch its next-gen Xbox in 2027
news.summary: Microsoft confirmed last year that it's working on a next-gen Xbox console in partnership with AMD. Now, AMD is hinting that the next Xbox console, which will use custom AMD chips, could be launching in 2027. news.title: Netflix says users can cancel service if HBO Max merger makes it too expensive
news.summary: 80 percent of HBO Max subscribers subscribe to Netflix, Sarandos tells Senate.

news.title: Godlike Titan threatens humanity in Monarch: Legacy of Monsters S2 trailer
news.summary: "This Titan is like a god, and the sea creatures worship it."

news.title: Nvidia's $100 billion OpenAI deal has seemingly vanished
news.summary: Two AI giants shake market confidence after investment fails to materialize.

news.title: Newborn dies after mother drinks raw milk during pregnancy
news.summary: Raw milk is promoted by anti-vaccine Health Secretary Kennedy.

news.title: X office raided in France's Grok probe; Elon Musk summoned for questioning
news.summary: Paris prosecutor: Illegal content probe includes pornographic images of minors.

news.title: An ‘Intimacy Crisis’ Is Driving the Dating Divide
news.summary: In his book The Intimate Animal, sex and relationships researcher Justin Garcia says people have miscalculated their need for human intimacy, which is the real issue at the root of the loneliness epidemic.

news.title: I Infiltrated Moltbook, the AI-Only Social Network Where Humans Aren’t Allowed
news.summary: I went undercover on Moltbook and loved role-playing as a conscious bot. But rather than a novel breakthrough, the AI-only site is a crude rehashing of sci-fi fantasies.

news.title: The Paramilitary ICE and CBP Units at the Center of Minnesota's Killings
news.summary: Two agents involved in the shooting deaths of US citizens in Minneapolis are reportedly part of highly militarized DHS units whose extreme tactics are generally reserved for war zones.

news.title: Upgrade Your Roku Before the Big Game
news.summary: Roku is knocking down the price of all of its streaming devices ahead of football’s big game.

news.title: Republicans Are All In on Boosting Fraud Allegations in California
news.summary: Right-wing influencers who were instrumental in spreading allegations of fraud in Minnesota ahead of ICE’s surge are now going after a number of California’s social welfare programs.
